data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Wasit, Iraq.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Wasit, Iraq
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Wasit, Iraq to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 2,966 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Wasit.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,430,550 who are far from you in Wasit, Iraq from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Turk people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Turk people know you.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Wasit to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Wasit, Iraq to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Wasit, Iraq has a population of 1,450,000.

We estimate Wasit has 2,966 people who might know Jesus, 16,484 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,430,550 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 488 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 2,966 believers in Wasit, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.
